title: Ask Steve, Serena Williams, Katt Williams, Tornadoes and more.
itunes:title: Ask Steve, Serena Williams, Katt Williams, Tornadoes and more.
description:
Today is a good day so rejoice and be glad.  Uncle Steve answers a letter from steveharveyfm.com.  Serena Williams claps back regarding her attire for tennis.  Katt Williams has money issues with former staff members.  We have yet another GOT update from our fearless leader.  Jon Snow goes to rehab????  We are praying for our families in the mid-west because of the tornadoes.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks to us about wealthy VS rich, 8 hours of sleep and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
